experience: Worked on the enterprise technology team where I developed a program to identify and reduce toil alerts sent to on-call engineers by 42.4%, with a total of over 70,000 alerts that came in over a period of 5 days

Implemented a caching system to reduce calls to New Relic, reducing the need to re-run recently ran queries and increased lambda function speed by 80%
Coordinated with other teams to collect app information and discuss decisions made on dropped alerts
Utilized GoLang, AWS, and New Relic
